name: View naming convention - character set control (SQL)
description: List of views that contain characters other than [a-Z,0-9,_]
output:
This report lists all View names containing characters other than [a-Z,0-9,_]

It provides the following information:

- View name, 
- View full name
rationale:
For readability and changeability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.


=> View names should not contain characters other than [a-Z,0-9,_]
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
alternativeName: View naming convention - character set control (SQL)
